data.scheme_name: Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Udhyog Uday Yojana for SC/ST Entrepreneurs for MSME - Assistance to MSEs for shed developed by Private Developer - SC/ST - Existing
data.benefits: The Scheme for shed development provide assistance to private developer upto 15% on total cost shed which includes land, building, other infrastructure facilities, Technical Consultancy fees and Third-Party Quality Assurance charges.
data.eligibility:
Entrepreneur should belong to Scheduled Caste/Scheduled Tribe category and belong to Micro or Small Enterprise.
Trading industry and industries mentioned in additional information are ineligible.
data.conditions:
1. Private developer will allot shed to SC/ST entrepreneur in the mini estate approved under the scheme
  2. The size of the shed shall be 50 sq. mt. to 100 sq. mt.
  3. The size of mini estate shall not be more than 2 Hectare
  4. Developer shall not sell more than one shed to one MSE
  5. The developer shall have to maintain the project for 5 years and thereafter developer has to handover the operation and maintenance to the members of association of the estate
  6. Developer shall have to determine the allotment price of the shed and the same shall not be increased for 3 years from the date of first sale deed
  7. After completion of 3 years from the date of first sale deed, developer may sell remaining un-sold sheds without any assistance
  8. No additional charge shall be collected from the MSE industrial unit of SC/ST for providing facilities except user charges as ddecided in consultation with association of shed holders
  9. Trading activity will not be eligible under the scheme and only the services activities mentioned below will be eligible :-
    • Logistics facilities such as Container Freight Station Operators/ Warehouse/ Cold Storages etc
    • Material Testing Centre
    • Startups and Incubation Centre
    • Hallmark Certification Centres
    • Technical testing and analysis servicing
    • Maintenance and repair of machineries and equipments
    • Repair of Computers/ Communication and Electronics equipments/ Household goods
    • Maintenance and Repair of Utility Projects
    • Packaging services
    • Industrial reuse/ disposal services
    • Apparel/ Cutting and Stitching job work (other than retail tailoring)
    • Printing, Scanning, Digitalization and Lamination
    • Weigh bridges
    • Color labs
    • Steam and Air conditioning supply
    • Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities
    • Electrical, plumbing and other installation activities
    • Maintenance and repair of Motor Vehicles
    • Motion pictures, Video and Television production, Sound Recording and Music publishing activities
    • Activities of internet access by the operator of the wireless/ satellite infrastructure
    • Web hosting activities
    • Specialize design activities - Fashion design related to Textile/ Apparel/ Jewellery/ Furniture/ Fashion goods/ Graphic design, etc.
    • State Level Empowered Committee is empowered to add/ delete service activities listed.

data.context: The primary mission of The Industrial Policy 2020 includes support for development of MSMEs., focus on Export Competitiveness: Vocal for Local to become Global and thus integrated value chains across product segments.
data.objective: To provide assistance to entrepreneurs for acquiring shed provided by Private Developer.
data.description:
1. The private developer will be eligible for additional assistance up to 15% of the total cost of land, building, other infrastructure facilities, Technical Consultancy fees and Third-Party Quality Assurance charges which is termed as cost of shed (in addition to 55% assistance granted by the government to private developer).
  2. On payment of 30% of price of shed to private developer by SC/ST entrepreneur, the private developer will hand over the possession and submit the claim. The assistance under the scheme will be disbursed to private developer at the rate of 35% of the cost of shed on the sale of individual shed and the remaining assistance shall be disbursed to private developer after the commencement of production by MSEs.
data.how_to_apply: The private developer after allotment of shed to SC/ST entrepreneur will submit the claim of assistance to MSME Commission rate in prescribed proforma issued by MSME Commission rate.
data.funding_facilitator: Industries and Mines Department, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism: The assistance will be release after the approval by Industries Commissioner
data.additional_info: The enterprise that has availed assistance under this component cannot avail assistance under any other scheme of other department of state government for the same component providing similar benefit. However, Enterprise can avail under such schemes of Government of India, if any.
data.checklist_info_a:
For Registration 
1. Duly Signed Application Form* 
2. Copy of Certificate for Constitution of Developer Company/Firm 
3. Copy of PAN Card of Developer Company/Firm 
4. Authority Letter/Board Resolution for signing on behalf of Developer Company/Firm 
5. Copy of Sale Deed or 7/12 of Survey No. or Non-Agricultural Order of Land purchased for Mini Estate (if required) 
6. Village Map of Land in which Mini Estate is to be developed (with Highlighted Survey/Block Nos.) 
7. Lay-out of the proposed Mini Estate (Certified by Approved Civil Engineer/Architect) 
8. Project Report 
9. Affidavit for Registration 
 For Sanction 
10. Duly Signed Application Form* 
11. Approved Lay-out Plan from Concerned Govt. Authority for the proposed Mini Estate 
12. Detailed Project Report prepared by Chartered Engineer / CA 
13. Certificate of CA for Net Worth of Developer Company/Firm/Promoters 
14. Sanction Letter, Approval Letter, Disbursement Details, etc (If you have applied to Central Government for incentives/assistance under any scheme of Govt. of India) 
15. Affidavit for Sanction 
Affidavit for Registration – 
https://msmec.gujarat.gov.in/uploads/incentiveschemes/Affidavit-Format-for-Registration.pdf 

Affidavit for Sanction – 
https://msmec.gujarat.gov.in/uploads/incentiveschemes/Affidavit-Format-for-Sanction.pdf
data.checklist_info_d:
Address:
Industries Commissionerate (MSME Incentive),
4th Floor, Block No. 1, Udyog Bhavan, Sector 11, 
Gandhinagar-382010

For other addresses visit- https://msmec.gujarat.gov.in/districtindustrieslist 

Email id: msmeinc@gujarat.gov.in / dci-msme-inc@gujarat.gov.in / io-msme-inc@gujarat.gov.in
Contact Details: 079 23258386, 079 23258387, 079 23258381
